title: Fire and Ice
description: This story is also available in the short story collection, Tales of Oescienne - Volume One.The Tanaan dragon Jaax and his colleagues are called upon to save a small town from the wrath of one of the Crimson King's evil dragons. In the process, Jaax receives a minor injury, a nagging reminder of his failure that soon becomes the symbol of another's triumph.
author: Jenna Elizabeth Johnson
